title: The first Macallan Masterclass at Club Mareva Beirut

content.raw:
Last night, we had the pleasure of hosting The Macallan Masterclass at Club Mareva Beirut, an evening that combined sophistication, camaraderie, and the finest whiskies. The event was private and led by the esteemed Master of Spirits, Elie Abi Khalil, who guided us through an exceptional tasting journey. The festive decor, warm ambiance, and the presence of our wonderful guests made it a truly memorable experience.

 

The Whiskies We Tasted

Our journey through the world of Macallan included an exquisite lineup of their finest expressions:

Macallan 12 Double Cask: A harmonious balance of American and European oak, showcasing subtle spices and dried fruit.

Macallan 15 Double Cask: A refined whisky with a richer profile, highlighting honey, citrus, and delicate spice.

Macallan 18 Sherry Cask: A masterpiece of maturity, offering deep sherry flavors, dark chocolate, and hints of dried fruit.

Macallan A Night on Earth Jerez: A limited-edition whisky celebrating festive traditions, with a distinct nutty and fruity character.

Macallan Classic Cut 2024: A bold and rich whisky, perfect for connoisseurs, featuring warm spices, oak, and a lasting finish.

 

Highlights of the Evening

The evening was about more than just the whiskies—it was about the experience:

Interactive Tasting: Elie Abi Khalil’s expert insights added depth to the tasting, helping us appreciate the unique characteristics of each whisky.

Perfect Pairings: Guests paired their whiskies with fine cigars from our exclusive selection, elevating the sensory experience.

Festive Atmosphere: The beautifully decorated space, with holiday lights and cheerful vibes, created the perfect backdrop for the event.

 

A Word of Thanks

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to all our guests for making this evening special. Your enthusiasm and love for fine whiskies and cigars inspire us to continue curating such unique experiences. A special thank you to Elie Abi Khalil for sharing his expertise and to The Macallan for their exceptional whiskies.

Stay tuned for more exclusive events at Club Mareva Beirut. Until next time, cheers to great company and even greater moments!
